author: Stephon Johnson
comment: Pretty nice it would be better if you could edit your profile more w/ pictures and cool filters

author: Steven P. Anderson Sr.
comment: My favorite app ever, jumped on getting premium but the 200GB cloud storage, what happens when I exceed the limit?

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Steven! Thank you so much for the feedback and support! We are working on a plan for our heavy users. If you need further help feel free to reach out at glide.me/help.

comment: I am not gay and I am not single so if you could please stop putting on gay dating apps and dating apps that pop up I would like that very much,  Thank You

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hey, thank you for your feedback! We will see what we can do on our end. But don't forget, to enjoy ad-free use of the app you can participate in Glide Premium. Just navigate to your profile, select "Glide Premium". Thanks!

author: Eddie Akins
comment: Works Great

author: Mark Gordon
comment: I am using this App for an online training group I am a part of. This may sound harsh, yet this App might be better called Glitch. Some of our team experience the video portion racing in fast motion ahead of the audio. Even with a large bandwidth and no other users, the videos will often stop several times through the five minute limit. I have timed the length it takes and averaged it out. 14 minutes is the average, to completely get through a  five minute post. I feel generous giving three stars.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Mark, we want to help! Please report one of these videos that had the issue with audio so our tech team can take a look. Long-press on the message and select "Report Message." Don't forget to include a description. Thank you!

comment: I hate how the ads took over the glides. I can't cancel them out, they are stuck on it.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hey, thank you for your feedback! To enjoy ad-free use of the app you can participate in Glide Premium. Just navigate to your profile, select "Glide Premium" then select an offer and follow the instructions to participate. We will be offering an optional paid version soon, so please stay tuned!

author: Aaron B Williams
comment: Love it and easy for me to communicate with Deaf people to understand use sign language and hearing people I use text that I feedback back and forth Deaf people or Hard of hearing  have a hard time to understand English  language.  Easy to use our sign language communicate

author: Deidra Lowery
comment: There must be some bugs. Currently, all of the chat requests and people I blocked since 2014 have all of a sudden appeared in my inbox. When I sent a bug report, I received an auto-response regarding something that I didn't even mention in the bug report. I liked this app at first now it's a nuisance.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Deidra! If you received an automatic message that didn't answer your questions, please email us back so that we can respond. Thanks!

author: Heather Dishman
comment: Chat requests are not in date and time order..... i can no longer find my messages unless i scroll forever.  Worthless to do all that.  Last two updates broke this...

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Heather, please report this as a bug from within the app the next time this happens by navigating to your profile and selecting "Report a bug" so our tech team can assist you. Thank you!

author: Rhonda Day
comment: I'm only a few days into it, but so far it seems easy to use. Camera and video were tricky for a moment but I'm figuring it out quickly.

author: John McCulloch
comment: Was a * * * when I didn't know/use it much... Now it WOULD be a 5 Star except that a recent change has made the advertising more prominent - I understand the need for it, but it is more 'in your face' and annoying now.

author: Cherie James
comment: There is no option to close your account, so once it is loaded you are stuck with it. Sure you can uninstall but that doesnt close out your account. There needs to be a close option like all other sites.
I only wish there was a way to retrack the glides that have already viewed instead of  searching  to find a certain vide glide

author: Ren A
comment: Last update(s) and support recd via email were horrible for the platform. Need to add more preference filters.

author: Keshawn Drawhorn
comment: I can't get messages on time people write me and i don't get it till 2 days later just horrible

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Keshawn, the next time this happens please report one of these messages so we can investigate further. To report, long-press on the message and select "Report Message." Don't forget to include a description. Thank you!

author: Monette M
comment: Someone could report you and your profile being inappropriate when it's not and your app gets blocked it's not fair so thumbs down to Glide because you have people being very inappropriate with their profile pictures and they're never reported

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Monette, all public profiles with inappropriate pictures are blocked by our staff. If you think you were mistakenly blocked please contact us at discover@glide.me with either your phone number or email address associated with your Glide account. Thanks!

author: RJ Smartphone
comment: My friends never got my videos in the past months and even I bought a new phone.  It still not working!

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi RJ, please report one of these videos so our tech team can take a look. Long-press on the message and select "Report Message." Don't forget to include a description. Thank you!

author: Ayono Walton
comment: I don't like that camera preview thing in the chat, can we have the option to turn it off? Also I hope that there will soon be a way to use this app with something other than a phone number or facebook.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Ayono! Tap anywhere outside of the video preview and it will disappear and tap the record button once to bring it back. We also just added email login, contact us at glide.me/help for more info. Thanks!

author: Robert Henry Rockwell
comment: I've been enjoying it but my only issue is with the adds because I don't understand why It should half to be on it when it wasn't already on it

author: Mary Afzal
comment: I love this app because you get to meet and socialize with respectable men some men are pervert  I do not need and want to see men's penises so please the ones that wants to show their body parts to us women stop the Minions from showing their penises thank u

author: Dominique Nikki
comment: I have been using glide for six years to mainly keep in contact with long distance family and friends. I absolutely love glide!

author: Sasha Ford
comment: This deserves 3 stars cause it doesn't tell me when I get a video or a message from somebody on glide ( Notifications not working and I have them on)😤

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Sasha, please write to us at www.glide.me/help and our support team will be happy to help. Thank you!

author: Brian Clayborne
comment: It's great but I'm deaf. So I love your glide no matter what you do to mine. Welcome to our world. God bless us all. Enjoy your time.

author: Val Trujillo
comment: Recently I was logged out and my account was essentially deleted.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Val,  please contact us at glide.me/help so we can assist you with this. Don't forget to include the phone number associated with your Glide account so that we can locate your information. Thanks!

comment: I Love it! I am able to watch my Grandbaby grow. She is a great distance away Glide allows me to see her everyday.
I never receive notifications timely.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi, please report this as a bug from within the app the next time this happens by navigating to your profile and selecting "Report a bug" so our tech team can assist you. Thank you!

author: Erik K
comment: Love it as I am deaf

author: Jeleesa McAlpine
comment: All in all a pretty good app. I just wish there were ways to save the videos. Unless I'm missing something.

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Jeleesa! There absolutely is a way to save your messages. Simply long-press and select "Save." If you need further assistance, contact us at glide.me/help. Thanks!

author: Aries Finch
comment: Its not notifying me that I have messages

reply.author: Glide
reply.content: Hi Aries! We can help with that! Please write to us at glide.me/help and don't forget to include your phone number or email that's associated with your Glide account. Thanks!

comment: Does not work at all

comment: Good for keeping in touch with people not close to you that you want to see when you talk to them.

comment: Great video messaging app

comment: Fantastic for ASL chatting! Best app for it right now!
